ideas.headerDescription: Try Scratch’s Project Idea Generator! Pick as many ideas as you’d like. Mix and match ideas! Remix your own idea generator! The possibilities are endless.
ideas.headerImageDescription: Scratch cat holding a lightning bulb and a block
ideas.headerButtonMessage: ជ្រើសរើសការបង្ហាញ
ideas.gettingStartedImageDescription: An illustrated boy plants his flag on top of a freshly painted mountaintop.
ideas.seeTutorialsLibraryImageDescriptio: An illustration of three tutorial thumbnails.
ideas.animateANameTitle: ធ្វើឈ្មោះមានចលនា
ideas.animateANameDescription: ធ្វើឲ្យតួអក្សរក្នុងឈ្មោះរបស់អ្នក អក្សរកាត់ ឬពាក្យដែលអ្នកចូលចិត្ត មានចលនា
ideas.animateANameImageDescription: The name ANYA in all caps and blocked letters is poised to wiggle
ideas.animateACharacterTitle: ធ្វើឲ្យតួអង្គមានចលនា
ideas.animateACharacterDescription: ធ្វើឲ្យតួអង្គមានជីវិតដោយប្រើចលនា
ideas.animateACharacterImageDescription: An taco with a wand, wizard cap and flowing white beard floats enchantingly in low-Earth orbit.
ideas.makeMusicTitle: បង្កើតតន្រ្តី
ideas.makeMusicDescription: ជ្រើសរើសឧបករណ៍ បន្ថែមសម្លេង និងចុចច្នុចដើម្បីលេងតន្រ្តី។
ideas.makeMusicImageDescription: Strings vibrate on an illustrated Gibson explorer.
ideas.createAStoryDescription: ជ្រើសតួអង្គ បន្ថែមកិច្ចសន្ទនា ហើយធ្វើឲ្យរឿងរបស់អ្នករស់រវើក
ideas.createAStoryImageDescription: A wizard beckons a traveling witch towards a distant castle.
ideas.chaseGameTitle: បង្កើតហ្គេមដេញចាប់
ideas.chaseGameDescription: ធ្វើហ្គេមមួយដែលអ្នកដេញចាប់តួអង្គណាមួយដើម្បីយកពិន្ទុ។
ideas.chaseGameImageDescription: A happy interactive octopus passes over a star.
ideas.videoSensingTitle: ញ្ញាណតាមវីដេអូ
ideas.videoSensingDescription: ធ្វើអន្តរកម្មជាមួយ​កិច្ចការ​ដោយប្រើកម្មវិធីបន្ថែមញ្ញាណវីដេអូ
ideas.videoSensingImageDescription: A virtual hand dodges a spurt of flame in an attempt to pet a dragon.
ideas.cardsIllustrationDescription: An assortment of fun, animated characters and objects leap out of a stack of cards.
ideas.starterProjectsImageDescription: An illustration of the Scratch Code Editor.
ideas.starterProjectsButton: រកមើលកិច្ចការស្រួលៗ
ideas.tryTheTutorial: សាកល្បងការបង្ហាញ
ideas.educatorGuide: មគ្គទេសក៍សម្រាប់គ្រូ
ideas.scratchYouTubeChannelDescription: This is the official Youtube Channel of Scratch. We share resources, tutorials, and stories about Scratch.
ideas.microBitBody: Connect your Scratch project to the real world.
ideas.makeyMakeyBody: Turn anything into a key that connects with your Scratch project!
ideas.desktopEditorHeader: ទាញយកកម្មវិធី Scratch
ideas.desktopEditorBodyHTML: ដើម្បីបង្កើតកិច្ចការដោយមិនប្រើអ៊ីនធឺណិត អ្នកអាចទាញយកកម្មវិធី Scratch ។
ideas.questionsBodyHTML: មានសំណួរផ្សេងទៀតមែនទេ? សូមមើល <faq>សំណួរពេញនិយម</faq> ឬ ទៅកាន់<forum>វេទិកាសម្រាប់ជំនួយសរសេរស្រ្គីប</forum>។
ideas.MakeItFlyTitle: ធ្វើឲ្យវាហោះ
ideas.MakeItFlyDescription: ជ្រើសរើសតួអង្គ ហើយធ្វើឲ្យវាហោះ!
ideas.MakeItFlyImageDescription: The scratch cat flies over the skyline. Alongside a flying taco.
ideas.PongTitle: ហ្គេមបាល់លោត
ideas.PongDescription: បង្កើតហ្គេមបាល់លោតដោយមានសម្លេង ពិន្ទុ និង បែបបទផ្សេងៗ។
ideas.PongImageDescription: A ball bounces off a digital paddle.
ideas.ImagineTitle: ស្រមៃពីពិភពមួយ
ideas.ImagineDescription: សាកស្រមៃពីពិភពដែលអ្វីៗសុទ្ធតែអាចកើតឡើងបាន។
ideas.ImagineImageDescription: A girl stands proudly in front of a thought bubble as big as the Earth and as intricate as butterfly wings.
ideas.modalCardNameCreateSprite: Create a Sprite with the Paint Editor
ideas.modalCardNameSound: Sound: Add, Record, and Use Text to Speech Blocks
ideas.modalCardNameFaceSensing: Scratch Lab Face Sensing Coding Cards
ideas.downloadGuides: Computer doesn’t allow Youtube? Download written guides for these topics.
